rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {2982, 2984, 2985, 2986, 3462}

description: The treatment of scars has become increasingly complex with a growing array of techniques and products available for use. The related costs for the management of scars is also expanding. This elective aims to explore current scar management practices and their evidential base. Knowledge of scar histology and appropriate outcome measurements will be used to critically evaluate interventions such as pressure therapy, massage and the use of contact media.
faculty: Faculty of Pharmacy and Pharmaceutical Sciences
